params.totalRewards: all of the rewards in that epoch

params.epoch: epoch to estimate the rewards of

returns._0: The 4 byte selector required by IERC20SplitterReceiver

EpochFinalized(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted once `epoch` has been finalized and will no longer change

distributeFiduTo(address,uint256).notice: Have the collector distribute `amount` of Fidu to `addr`

estimateRewardsFor(uint256).notice: Estimate rewards for a given epoch. For epochs at or before lastFinalizedEpoch  this will be the fixed, accurate reward for the epoch. For the current and other  non-finalized epochs, this will be the value as if the epoch were finalized in that  moment.

finalizeEpochs().notice: Finalize all unfinalized epochs. Causes the reserve splitter to distribute  if there are unfinalized epochs so all possible rewards are distributed.

firstRewardEpoch().notice: The first epoch rewards should be provided in

lastCheckpointAt().notice: The last block.timestamp when epochs were finalized. The last   finalized epoch is the most recent epoch that ends before lastCheckpointAt.

lastFinalizedEpoch().notice: The last epoch whose rewards should be considered finalized and ready to be claimed

onReceive(uint256).notice: Receive handler for the reserve ERC20Splitter. This handler uses the USDC   amount it has received to acquire fidu from the senior pool and distribute it across   epochs that have elapsed since the last distribution. The fidu rewards are distributed   proportionaly across epochs based on their portion of total elapsed time. Once an epoch   has passed, it is consider "finalized" and no longer considered for future runs of this   function.

rewardsForEpoch(uint256).notice: A mapping of epochs to fidu reward amounts

userdoc.notice: Responsible for receiving USDC from ERC20Splitter, using it to acquire fidu, and allocating   it to epochs, where it can be claimed by membership participants.
